title: Do We Need to Defund the Police?
itunes:title: Do We Need to Defund the Police?
description:
Today on the show we had Jalen Rose and Jacoby from ESPN call in where they spoke about the continuation of the NBA, Roger Goodell apology and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Nanci Pelosi and all the conressional caucasion democrats pandering wearing a Kente cloth while taking a knee for George Floyd instead of using privilege to change legislation. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about defunding the police?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
